title: Liam Hemsworth is ready to date again after heartbreaking split from wife Miley Cyrus
text:
Liam Hemsworth is ready to start dating again after splitting from his wife Miley Cyrus earlier this year.

The 29-year-old star, who has been filming Dodge And Miles in Canada this month, hopes to find romance soon, according to UsWeekly.

Meanwhile, 26-year-old Cyrus has been dating handsome Australian singer Cody Simpson since splitting from Instagram model Kaitlynn Carter.

On the prowl? Liam Hemsworth is ready to start dating again after splitting from his wife Miley Cyrus earlier this year. The star, who has been filming Doge And Miles in Canada this month, hopes to find romance soon, according to UsWeekly. Seen in February

She moved on fast: Meanwhile, Cyrus has been dating handsome Australian singer Cody Simpson since splitting from Instagram model Kaitlynn Carter

'He hasn't been dating anyone,' a source told the magazine. 'But he's open to meeting people.'

The last time he split from Miley was in 2013 and he started seeing beauty Eiza González.

The Hunger Games hunk was spotted kissing the Mexican singer-actress a day after it was confirmed that he and Cyrus had called off their engagement.

They had high hopes for love: The two wed in December during a small ceremony

The honeymoon did not last long: But by May, the two seemed to be at odds as they attended the Met Gala in NYC

Liam and Eiza split after dating for only a few months.

In the past he has dated Eiza Gonzalez

Before meeting Miley on the set of the 2010 Nicholas Sparks drama The Last Song, Hemsworth was with Laura Griffin. They were together from 2006 until 2009.

Cyrus and Hemsworth initially began dating from 2009, got engaged in 2012, broke up in 2013, and rekindled the romance around 2016. They wed in 2018.

The Malibu singer seems to be having a ball with Simpson whom she is already calling her 'boyfriend.'

He has been by her side even though she is in the hospital fighting tonsillitis.

The Australian musician - who used to date Gigi Hadid - also brought roses for his beloved, as he arrived toting his guitar case.

Cyrus was also visited by her mom Tish, who brushed her daughter's hair while she modeled a hospital gown in the bathroom mirror.
description: The star, who has been filming Doge And Miles in Canada this month, hopes to find romance soon, according to UsWeekly. In the past he has dated Eiza Gonzalez
